title: 1Word Bible (KJV)
summary: Bible Reader designed to make tagging and highlighting easy and fun
description: This application is a Bible Reader (KJV) with a bit of a different spin.  The Bible is called the Word, this app was developed to quickly look up verses in the bible with a click of a word. Easy to use tag feature to store all your favorite verses or verses related to a certain topic.  Hopefully it will bring encouragement to those who need it. * Download 1Word Wearable from the playstore * Most features available on mobile version are now available on wearable version * Key word searches make reading fun and exciting * Topical searches * Share scripture with friends * Highlight verses * Quickly sort highlights by chosen color * Add notes to verses for deeper interaction * Favorite verses for easy lookup * Web searching * Scroll through every word in the word for a deeper connection with your creator
descriptionHTML:
This application is a Bible Reader (KJV) with a bit of a different spin. The Bible is called the Word, this app was developed to quickly look up verses in the bible with a click of a word. Easy to use tag feature to store all your favorite verses or verses related to a certain topic. Hopefully it will bring encouragement to those who need it.

* Download 1Word Wearable from the playstore
* Most features available on mobile version are now available on wearable version
* Key word searches make reading fun and exciting
* Topical searches
* Share scripture with friends
* Highlight verses
* Quickly sort highlights by chosen color
* Add notes to verses for deeper interaction
* Favorite verses for easy lookup
* Web searching
* Scroll through every word in the word for a deeper connection with your creator
comments: If the print was a bit larger it would be much easier to read.   Right now it strains my eyes just to read it at all.
Excellent Thank you Lord God, for You Word. I Pray Father, that you Bless All involved with the work of producing this wonderful application. Amen!
I love it It's the best bible app ever ðŸ“¿ðŸ“–ðŸ“–
Nice mobile app for THE Word. Would like highlighting to be more obvious.
recentChanges: * Revamped highlight colors and removed ssl error
* Added NEW Read Chapter Option - long click on chapter list for this option
* Added NEW post verse option - share your verses with the 1Word community
* Loop through your favorite verses and send notification to device and smart watch
* More Android Wear features to come
